projects.title: PLIT LEARN
projects.description: A full-stack educational website for Plit Learn using React.js, Tailwind CSS, and a Python backend to showcase courses and key info. Improved user engagement by 20% in 3 months and boosted seamless payments by 60% with a custom payment API.

projects.title: FLICKVIEW
projects.description: A full-stack movie discovery platform built with React.js, Tailwind CSS, and a Python backend. Showcased trending films, detailed movie pages, and integrated third-party APIs for trailers and reviews. Enhanced user interaction by 30% through custom watchlists and real-time search functionality.

projects.title: JOBIFY
projects.description: A job listing web application built using React.js, Tailwind CSS, and Flask. Included advanced job filtering, resume uploads, and employer management tools. Improved job seeker engagement by 40% and automated email alerts boosted application submissions by 60%.

projects.title: DIGITAZ
projects.description: A scalable e-commerce website developed using React.js, Tailwind CSS, and Django REST Framework. Featured dynamic product listings, cart management, and secure payments. Increased user conversions by 45% and optimized checkout flow with a custom payment gateway integration..
